00024 BEHAVIOR_STATUS GoStraight::execute(void* agent)
00025 {
00026         GameObject* ship = (GameObject*) agent;
00027 #ifdef PHYSICS
00028         ship->applyForcePolar(ship->displayHeading,.005);
00029 #else
00030         ws->moveObject(ship,ship->location.offsetPolar(ship->displayHeading,speed));
00031 #endif
00032         return BT_RUNNING;
00033 }
